[ usually plural ] something such as a picture, photograph, or piece of film used to give a particular effect or to explain something: The wildlife programme has some stunning visuals. Using both words and visuals makes it easier for students to focus on and improve their writing methods.
informal an act of seeing or someone or something, or being able to see them in your mind: I ran out the back door looking to see if I could get a visual on him before he disappeared. Do you have a visual on the sniper? Now when people get visuals of an aeroplane crashing, they don't want to get on a plane.
